SEARCH

Class BudgetTrackerGUI

java.lang.Object
BudgetTrackerGUI
public class BudgetTrackerGUI extends Object
A GUI application for tracking student budgets, allowing users to add transactions, view transaction history, analyze monthly summaries, and view category breakdowns.

  • Constructor Details

    • BudgetTrackerGUI

      public BudgetTrackerGUI()
      Constructs a new BudgetTrackerGUI and initializes the GUI components.

  • Method Details

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
      The main entry point for the application. Sets the system look and feel and creates an instance of BudgetTrackerGUI.
      Parameters:
      args - command line arguments (not used)

    • prepareGUI

      private void prepareGUI()
      Initializes and prepares the main GUI components including the main frame, tabbed interface, and menu bar.

    • createMenuBar

      private JMenuBar createMenuBar()
      Creates and returns the application's menu bar with File and Help menus.
      Returns:
      the configured JMenuBar for the application

    • createAddTransactionPanel

      private JPanel createAddTransactionPanel()
      Creates and returns the panel for adding new transactions. Contains form fields for transaction details and an add button.
      Returns:
      the configured JPanel for adding transactions

    • createViewTransactionsPanel

      private JPanel createViewTransactionsPanel()
      Creates and returns the panel for viewing and filtering transactions. Includes a table display, filter controls, and export functionality.
      Returns:
      the configured JPanel for viewing transactions

    • refreshTransactionsTable

      private void refreshTransactionsTable()
      Refreshes the transactions table with all transactions from the TransactionManager. This is a convenience method that calls refreshTransactionsTable("All").

    • refreshTransactionsTable

      private void refreshTransactionsTable(String filterType)
      Refreshes the transactions table with transactions filtered by the specified type.
      Parameters:
      filterType - the type of transactions to display ("All", "Income", or "Expense")

    • exportToCSV

      private void exportToCSV()
      Exports the current transactions to a CSV file selected by the user. Displays success or error messages in dialog boxes.

    • createMonthlySummaryPanel

      private JPanel createMonthlySummaryPanel()
      Creates and returns the panel for displaying monthly summary information. Includes income/expense totals, net savings, and a pie chart visualization.
      Returns:
      the configured JPanel for monthly summary

    • createCategoryBreakdownPanel

      private JPanel createCategoryBreakdownPanel()
      Creates and returns the panel for displaying category breakdown information. Includes month/year selection controls and a pie chart visualization.
      Returns:
      the configured JPanel for category breakdown

    • getFilteredCategoryBreakdown

      private Map<String,Double> getFilteredCategoryBreakdown(int month, String yearFilter)
      Retrieves a filtered breakdown of expenses by category for the specified month and year.
      Parameters:
      month - the month to filter by (0 for all months)
      yearFilter - the year to filter by as a String ("All Years" or specific year)
      Returns:
      a Map of category names to total amounts for the filtered transactions
